org.youscope.common.job

Interface JobContainerConfiguration

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AutoFocusJobConfiguration, CellDetectionJobConfiguration, CompositeJobConfiguration, CustomJobConfiguration, DeviceSlidesJobConfiguration, ExecuteAndWaitJobConfiguration, LiveModifiableJobConfiguration, MicroplateJobConfiguration, MicroplateMeasurementConfiguration, PlateScanningJobConfiguration, RepeatJobConfiguration, ScriptingJobConfiguration, SimpleMeasurementConfiguration, StaggeringJobConfiguration, StatisticsJobConfiguration, TaskConfiguration, ZSlidesJobConfiguration

    public interface JobContainerConfiguration
    Interface each job configuration should implement which contains sub-jobs. By implementing this interface one accepts the contract that each job created by the respective configuration also implements the JobContainer interface. Implementing this interface allows for configuration validity checks and enables to use several UI elements.
    Author:
    Moritz Lang

      • addJob

        Adds a job to the job list.
        Parameters:
        job - Job to be added.

      • addJob

        void addJob(JobConfiguration job,
            int index)
        Adds a job to the job list. The job is added such that it has the given index. Jobs having a higher or equal index before the operation are moved downwards.
        Parameters:
        job - Job to be added.
        index - Index where the job should be added.

      • clearJobs

        void clearJobs()
        Removes all jobs from the job list.
